newsitem.title: USA: Datastream sees Q3 in line with estimates.
newsitem.headline: Datastream sees Q3 in line with estimates.

text.p: Datastream Systems Inc said on Tuesday it expects to report third quarter revenues of $8.3 million and "remains comfortable" with the published analysts' consensus for the period.
Wall Street analysts have a consensus earnings estimate for Datastream of $0.21 a share, according to First Call.
In last year's third quarter, Datastream reported profits of $1.3 million, or $0.17 a share, on sales of $5.6 million.
The company expects to report its results on October 18, 1996, at 0830 EDT/1230 GMT, followed by an investor teleconference at 1000 EDT/1400 GMT.
